titles: William, by the prouidence of God, Bishop of Exeter, to all and singular archdeacons, officials, parsons ... and all other ecclesiasticall officers ... greeeting [sic] whereas His Majesty, for the seasoning of all youth in their due alleageance, hath caused a booke to  bee compiled and imprinted ... intituled God and the King ...
author: Church of England. Diocese of Exeter. Bishop (1598-1621 : Cotton)
Cotton, William, d. 1621.
notes: Title from first six lines of text.
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
